solution_line_template: Making {pencils_per_day} pencils a day, he made {pencils_per_day} pencils/day * {days_per_week} days/week = <<{pencils_per_day}*{days_per_week}={pencils_made}>>{pencils_made} pencils during the week.
With the pencils from the stock, he got {pencils_made} pencils + {initial_stock} pencils = <<{pencils_made}+{initial_stock}={total_available}>>{total_available} pencils.
Subtracting the ones he sold, he has {total_available} pencils - {pencils_sold} pencils = <<{total_available}-{pencils_sold}={final_stock}>>{final_stock} pencils.
